doc: Phalcon Controller's action is not working properly
I have downloaded Phalcon Skeleton and upload into my site http://www.returnquick.com/rqadmin
and it working fine and display the page with
which mean the IndexController.php is load and working fine, even I try to pass the variable through $this->view->setVar('$var', 'Hello World') to display on /app/views/index/index.phtml.
the problem is when I try to access the another action ex: TestAction in IndexController.php it show me the 404 Page Not Found!
I'm pretty sure that all my configs and .htaccess are correct and all the same with http://returnquick.com/demo which also use Phalcon framework with same hosting
p.s apologize for my poor English..
